common_issues.title: Multiple PiecesOS Installations Detected
common_issues.description: Users are encountering an error during installation due to multiple PiecesOS instances present on their systems.  The error message suggests uninstalling all but one installation via 'Add or Remove Programs' to resolve the issue. This is crucial to prevent data corruption or unexpected errors.

related_issues.title: Detected multiple PiecesOS installations
related_issues.text:
Detected multiple PiecesOS installations

recommendations: Investigate the "Multiple PiecesOS Installations Detected" error and improve installation instructions or installer logic to prevent this issue.
Provide users with clear guidance on resolving the multiple installations error, potentially including automated cleanup tools.
Monitor the incoming tickets related to the "Multiple PiecesOS Installations Detected" error to identify any trends or patterns that may reveal underlying issues.
